meanings.definition: A person who has an excessive interest in or admiration of themselves.
meanings.sent1: The narcist couldn't stop talking about how amazing they were.
meanings.sent2: She always thought she was the best, a true narcist.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of narcists admiring themselves in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: His ego was so big, he was like a narcist in a sea of self-love.
meanings.sent5: The narcist's reflection in the mirror never looked away.
